name: Refined Fuel
notes: Ships drink it; wars start over it.

name: Precursor Relics
notes: Best not kept in the same room as curiosity.

name: Industrial Isotopes
notes: Reactor feedstock, medical imaging, and quiet leverage.

name: Bio-Gels
notes: Food, medicine, construction — all grown, all regulated.

name: Shipyard Services
notes: Refit slots are booked years ahead; bribery accelerates.

name: Pilgrimage Traffic
notes: A commodity of bodies and belief.

name: Indenture Contracts
notes: Illegal on paper; ubiquitous in practice.
